tweet.text: On January 23, 1997, Madeleine Albright was sworn in as the first woman and 64th U.S. Secretary of State. President Clinton remarked, "She knows from her life's experience that freedom has its price and democracy its rewards.” https://t.co/ibvpu9rlzt https://t.co/NacvzObP8b
tweet.html: On January 23, 1997, Madeleine Albright was sworn in as the first woman and 64th U.S. Secretary of State. President Clinton remarked, "She knows from her life's experience that freedom has its price and democracy its rewards.” ow.ly/E9RK50IwEJB
